programme.desc: Una refaccionaria se instala en la accesoria del edificio. La inauguración causa molestia entre los vecinos. Rocko y Arturo aprovechan para conseguir chamba en el local.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: El doctor Rafael Rivas se muda al edificio y Magdalena no deja pasar la oportunidad para conseguir una consulta gratis abusando de la confianza del nuevo inquilino.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Silvita trata de mantener limpios los pasillos del edificio, ya que Lorena y Magdalena sacaron todas sus macetas. Mientras Luis trabaja, Pedro y Cris verán una película.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Silvita le demostrará a su vieja amiga Caro que tiene un matrimonio perfecto con Luis. Además, Lorena culpa a Germán por no tener limpio el patio del edificio.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Frankie abre un canal de videos para hablar sobre todo lo que sabe de cine. Mientras tanto, Magdalena quiere tener un departamento con un jardín en el techo.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: La alcaldía anuncia un mega corte de agua y los vecinos acabarán con el suministro del edificio. Los López Pérez instalan un aire acondicionado en su departamento.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Un capítulo especial con las equivocaciones de los vecinos más divertidas de la temporada. Descubre quién de los inquilinos comete más errores a la hora de grabar los episodios de la serie.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: A plague of pigeons arrives at the building and the neighbors fight them off with help from Germán. The López Pérez family runs out of coffee and Arturo must get it from the neighbors.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: The neighbors organize to fight the Coronavirus pandemic. The situation is complicated when someone steals the antibacterial gel from the entrance.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Vanesa puts a garden in the building, but discovers that someone is stealing her vegetables. Rocko has an intense toothache and doesn't want to go to the dentist.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Magdalena sells her old mattress to Jorjais, unaware that Arturo keeps his savings there. Cris asks Pedro to formalize their relationship.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: It is Germán's 15th anniversary working in the building and is celebrated with a party. Frankie Rivers has a creative crisis.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: There is a leak in one of the gas tanks and Germán is in charge of repairing it. Benito has a casting for the Rocky movie.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Arturo takes out his old sewing machine to dedicate himself to sewing. Vanesa brings a rooster with Alzheimer's into the building that crows all day.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: The López Pérez need an extra income of money and Alejandra goes out to look for a job. Benito meets a friend from the castings and invites him to the apartment.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: A leak in the López Pérez bathroom causes leaks in Pedro's apartment. Benito and Liz go to a casting for the musical Grease.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Virginia is left homeless and jobless. Germán decides to give her asylum and she becomes everyone's best friend. Luis signs up for Zumba classes online.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Luis feels lonely and Silvia encourages him to organize a meeting in the apartment. Luis invites the married men in the building. Vanesa entrusts Germán with a little bird with behavior problems.

programme.title: Sortilegio
programme.desc: Alejandro returns home after a terrible accident to discover that he is married to Maria Jose, a poor, innocent girl who was deceived by Alejandro's brother Bruno. Bruno used Alejandro's name to marry Maria Jose, soon after he sent to kill his brother in hopes that Maria Jose would inherit Alejandro's fortune. But when Maria Jose arrives at the mansion she realizes that Bruno lied to her and used her. She is also scared when Alejandro is found alive and returns home. Doctors tell Alejandro that he suffers from memory loss but he is convinced he never met Maria Jose before and goes in search of the truth, but during this time and Maria Jose actually fall in love, while Bruno and Maura (Alejandro's ex-girlfriend) plot to break them up. Meanwhile, the brothers' mother Victoria has fallen in love with Fernando--Alejandro's best friend, so closer to his age than hers.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve is fascinated by indigenous people who live in the wilds South America. In this three-part series, he travels deep into the Amazon jungle to hunt with and learn from the locals there. Not only will this be one heck of a hunting adventure, it will be a mind-opening, life-changing event. From bowfishing to hunting in the jungle at night, you never know what the evening‚Äôs menu will bring.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Brittany and Helen have put more work in on MeatEater than just about anyone else, but have yet to hunt a big game animal. Steven Rinella takes them through the process from beginning to end. They need to get their hunters safety, learn to shoot, train for the woods, and get geared up. When November comes they're ready to go, and they strike out into the mountains of northern Montana for the adventure of their lives.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve returns to southern Arizona to stalk the elusive Coues deer. Unaccompanied, Steve immerses himself in the quiet southwest desert and gets intimate with one of the most wary animals in the west. Throughout the hunt, Steve articulates why solo time in trophy country is good for the soul.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve and bird hunting aficionado Ronny Boehme join up with wildlife biologist Ed Arnett in Lubbock, Texas to hunt Sandhill cranes. The Sandhill crane offers a unique wingshooting opportunity and also carries the nickname ‚Äúrib eye of the sky‚Äù because of its supposed similarities to a handsome cut of beef. ¬†It‚Äôs fast action and plenty of laughs as Steve, Ronny, and Ed explore the culinary delights of these birds with a Texas style ‚ÄúCrane Cookout.‚Äù

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Lightning strikes twice: Steven Rinella has somehow beaten the odds and drawn a second Muskox tag after having to forfeit his first one four years ago due to unforeseen circumstances. Steve has always regretted passing up an opportunity to hunt Muskox but with another tag in his pocket, nothing will stop this adventure. We learn about the native history and culture of Nunivak Island's as Steve tries to stay warm while chasing Muskox 30 miles offshore in the Bering Sea.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: The last time Joe Rogan and Bryan Callen went out with Steven Rinella they were soaked head to toe and came home meatless. To remedy their meat crisis while keeping them dry, Steve sets up a springtime wild turkey hunt in sunny California. Steve gives Joe and Bryan the A to Z on hunting, butchering, and cooking the wild turkey. Steve caps off the introductory lesson by preparing his favorite turkey recipe: Schnitzel.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In the first part of this series, Steve attempts a unique spring hunt for sooty grouse in the coastal rainforests of southeast Alaska. These mysterious hooters make for a hunt that is markedly different from any other and success doesn't come easily. They say blind squirrels can find a nut, but will Steve harvest a grouse?

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In Part One, Steve experienced the difficulty of hunting the Sooty grouse of southeast Alaska. In Part 2, Steve joins his friend Barbara in Juneau who shows him the in and outs of finding ‚Äúhooters.‚Äù Tromping through Southeast Alaska rainforest, Steve and Barbara discover a mutual fondness for an unconventional hunt. Barbara concludes the hunt with a beachside meal of fettuccine a la sooty grouse.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve loves to fish as much as he loves to hunt.¬†Steve is on a river in SW Montana for a day to catch some rainbow trout and cook a few over a fire. As fishing and campfire cooking offer time for reflection, Steve takes the time to recall a few memorable MeatEater meals.¬†From caveman style sheep ribs in the Alaska Range to curiosity-induced coyote BBQ in Mexico, these meals give Steve the chance to explore what it means to be a MeatEater.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Last spring, Steve decided to pass up an opportunity to kill a black bear in favor of an extended up close and personal experience. This time, Steve heads back to his shack on Prince of Wales Island and he‚Äôs brought his friend Paul Neess from Vortex Optics along to share the experience of using a canoe to slip in close to these giant black bears.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: All across America hunters kick off the fall hunting season with a weekend of doves, friends, and food. Steve's lifelong friend, Ronny Boehme has invited Steve out to his digs in Virginia for the dove opener. To prep for opening day, Steve and Ron spend a day brushing up on their shooting skills on a sporting clays course followed by a pigeon hunt. Steve shares simple, delicious cooking methods for doves and pigeons.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Ryan Callaghan and Aaron Evans join Steve on an epic adventure in British Columbia‚Äôs Rockies to pursue grizzly bears. Steve has long desired to take a grizzly but only if he can do it in a way that fits his personal ethics. The hunt is dampened by frustrating weather but Steve finds a way to fix a tasty meal.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve is fed up with disrespect for one of the world's most unique game animals-the pronghorn antelope. Throughout the hunt, Steve shares antelope biology, hunting techniques, and meat care. Steve aims to make antelope lovers out of everyone and get pronghorns the respect they deserve.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve‚Äôs quest for a giant mule deer buck continues in central Idaho. To help Steve in his journey, Ryan Callaghan has offered up one of his best spots as well as his keen spotting skills. The duo backpack hunt in some of the West‚Äôs steepest and prettiest mountains seeking the colossal buck of Steve‚Äôs dreams. In part one, frustration and opportunities abound and Ryan turns a failed black bear stalk turns into a successful buck hunt.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve's quest for a giant mule deer buck continues in central Idaho. To help Steve in his journey, Ryan Callaghan has offered up one of his best spots as well as his keen spotting skills. The duo backpack hunt in some of the West's steepest and prettiest mountains seeking the colossal buck of Steve's dreams. In part two Steve finds the buck he's been searching for his whole life. The dream is realized and Steve and Ryan feast on a slow cooked roast.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In this Cooking Special, Steve demonstrates how to butcher a whole whitetail deer, guiding you through the steps to transform it into steaks, roasts, shanks, and more. He covers every detail, including how to utilize parts that are often discarded, making sure nothing goes to waste. Perfect for anyone looking to make the most out of their deer harvest.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Helen Cho and Brittany Brothers are back for a double episode. This time around they‚Äôre hunting whitetail deer in Wisconsin on the famed Duren farm with Doug Duren and Steve as their guides. Arriving a few days early to scout and tune up their shooting with some squirrel hunting, the ladies enter the next chapter of their hunting journey.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Helen Cho and Brittany Brothers are back for a double episode. This time around they're hunting whitetail deer in Wisconsin on the famed Duren farm with Doug Duren and Steve as their guides. In part two both Helen and Brittany get their chance at Duren farm bucks. Hobo dinners over the campfire make it deer camp.
